com.habitsoft.kiyaa.widgets
Class ScrollAutoLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.habitsoft.kiyaa.widgets.ScrollAutoLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class ScrollAutoLoader
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget

Scroll panel with auto loading feature. Use this panel instead of regular paging. When the panel is scrolled to the bottom, it invokes a Loader object, which adds more content to the panel. TODO Allow items to be dropped off the beginning of the list when it gets long TODO Allow a "reverse" list which starts at the end and works upwards, for views where the last entries are the most interesting

ScrollAutoLoader

public ScrollAutoLoader(com.google.gwt.user.client.Element element,
                        ScrollAutoLoader.Loader loader,
                        int limit,
                        int maxHeight,
                        int end)
Create a new scroll panel.

Parameters:
widget - The inner panel. Add loaded content to this panel.
loader - The loader which is responsible for adding content to the inner panel.
limit - Number of items to retrieve with each load.
Method Detail

ensureVisible

public void ensureVisible(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject item)
Ensures that the specified item is visible, by adjusting the panel's scroll position.

Parameters:
item - the item whose visibility is to be ensured

fill

public void fill(com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback fillCompleteCallback)
Fill initial content into the scroll panel. Call this on startup (after the widget has been added to the DOM). Also call this method as the last item in Loader#load(int, int) to keep filling until the scrollbar appears. The callback is invoked when the initial load is complete. The callback may be null.
